Sept. 15, 1950 D Australian Championships (B Grade)
Australian Championships (B Grade) 20 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Australian Championships australian-championships-b-grade
Australia
B Grade
Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest
Sirius [Wright]
Adelaide, South Australia, Australia Championship included Test & Own Choice Selections Oval March / Quickstep March points listed under Stage March
The scheduled 1949 Australian championships event at Launceston, Tasmania was postponed due to an outbreak of poliomyelitis. It was rescheduled for Easter, 10th April 1950. As a result two Australian championship events were held in 1950; this was the designated 1950 event.
Own choice 15th Sep, Test 16th Sep.
Quickstep Diagram March & Oval March points were also included to determine the Championshipo
